page.title: 08Our Life in Harden Village
page.content: In my family there is Daddy who works for a Building Society, Mummy who does not go out to work, Matthew and Polly who are my younger brother and sister and me Emma. We get up at 7.45am and have breakfast. Mummy takes us to school and Daddy goes off to work in Bradford. On Thursday, Mum cleans the local church and helps with the Senior Citizens' Luncheon Club. She collects Matthew from play group and they have lunch. I have lunch at school. Mum cleans the house, she collects Polly and me from school at 3.30pm. When we get home we watch T.V. After tea I go to Brownies. At 8.00pm I go to bed. Visitors come to our house for a meeting. At about 11.30pm Mummy and Daddy go to bed. Homelife is fun.
